items.sentence: What was the name of that little shop in Boston where Tom worked?
I\'ve been expecting something like this to happen for some time.
I\'ve been trying to explain to Tom that he needs an appointment.
I wish that I hadn\'t promised Tom I\'d go to Australia with him.
Tom\'s parents think Tom is still too young to have a girlfriend.
Tom has another half an hour of work to do before he can go home.
When I was a student, I studied at least three hours every night.
When Tom was accused of the murder, he broke out in a cold sweat.
The doctor told Mary that she wouldn\'t be able to have children.
Tom wondered how Mary could be so sure that it was going to snow.
